attention.title: ATTENTION!
attention.description: The Management of PT. Rifan Financindo Berjangka (PT RFB) urges the public to be more cautious of various forms of investment fraud carried out in the name of PT RFB through electronic media or social media. Therefore, it must be ensured that fund transfers to the destination account (Segregated Account) for conducting Futures Trading transactions are in the name of PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka, not in the name of an individual.

company.title: PT RIFAN FINANCINDO BERJANGKA
